sense.name: feature
sense.commentary: A prominent aspect of something or someone.
sense.examples: Generosity is one of his best characteristics. Does the suspect have any distinguishing characteristics? I specified the device characteristics of my prototype laser beam. The map showed a lot of hills and other characteristics of the landscape.

sense.name: logarithms
sense.commentary: The integer part in the representation of a logarithm. You'll know it when you see it.
sense.examples: In the expression 'log 643 = 2.808', the characteristic is 2.
